original_text: The fifth angel poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast, and its kingdom was plunged into darkness. People gnawed their tongues in agony
korean_text: 또 다섯째 천사가 그 대접을 짐승의 왕좌에 쏟으니 그 나라가 곧 어두워지며 사람들이 아파서 자기 혀를 깨물고

sentences.original_text: The fifth angel poured out his bowl
on the throne of the beast
and its kingdom was plunged into darkness
People gnawed their tongues in agony
